issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Kill button should not be displayed for FAILED, KILLED and FINISHED apps in Application specific landing page
fields.summary: Kill application button is visible even if the application is FINISHED in RM UI

comments.body: Attached patch with fix to not display Kill Application button for applications which are in KILLED, FAILED or FINISHED state

Committed to trunk and branch-2. Also removed an unused import as per checkstyle error before committing. Thanks [~suma.shivaprasad] for the contribution.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #12811 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/12811/])
YARN-6992. Kill application button is visible even if the application is (sunilg: rev 6f101e7df10d477cf7469f6979d0cb8269315a3e)
* (edit) hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-server/hadoop-yarn-server-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/yarn/server/webapp/AppBlock.java
Shouldn't this bugfix be committed to branch-3.0 as well?
Yes [~jlowe]. I have now backported to branch-3 as well. Thank you.
